snippet: Rob Portman, who has ascended to senator from staff member during nearly three decades in Washington, is a potential pick to be Mitt Romney’s running mate.
abstract: Sen Rob Portman of Ohio is widely believed to be a top pick for Mitt Romney's running mate; has ascended the ranks from staff member to senator over three decades and is admired by Romney for his keen and deep understanding of the inner workings of government (Series: The Ticket).
lead_paragraph: Rob Portman, who has ascended to senator from staff member during nearly three decades in Washington, is a potential pick to be Mitt Romney’s running mate.

headline.print_headline: Possible No. 2 Knows Ways Of the Capital
headline.seo: Rob Portman, a Master of Washington’s Inner Workings
headline.main: Possible No. 2 to Romney Knows Ways of the Capital
